dct_title_s: Town plan of Bari. G.S.G.S. no. 4380
dct_description_sm: Map shows roads, railways, tramways, buildings, churches, cemeteries, and harbors. "Air photographs have been used in the production of this plan." "9-43." South Italy Grid - Convergence. "Grid provisional." Important buildings are named. "Published by War Office, 1942." Reprint January 1943. In upper left margin: Italy. "Air photographs have been used in the production of this plan." Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section. G.S.G.S. no. 4380
dct_creator_sm: Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section
dct_publisher_sm: [London] : War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section, 1942.
Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1943.
